```{python}
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np
import matplotlib as mpl

x,y= np.meshgrid(np.linspace(0,1000,1000),
                 np.linspace(0,1000,1000))
z= (x-500)**2 + (y-500)**2
plt.contourf(x,y,z,
             vmin=1000,
             vmax=10000,
            extend='both',
            locator=mpl.ticker.LogLocator(subs=[1.0, 2.5, 5.0, 7.5]))#subs=[1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9]))
cb=plt.colorbar()
#print(cb.get_ticks())
print(cb.set_ticklabels(cb.get_ticks()))
cb.locator= mpl.ticker.LogLocator()
```
